name: Homeland
summary: Homeland is the first novel in The Dark Elf Trilogy, a prequel to The Icewind Dale Trilogy, written by R. A. Salvatore and follows the story of Drizzt Do'Urden from the time and circumstances of his birth and his upbringing amongst the drow.
info:
• 中文名: 故土
  • 册数: 1
  • 作者: R.A. Salvatore、Robert Anthony Salvatore
  • 出版社: Wizards of the Coast
  • 价格: $7.99
  • 发售日: 1990-12
  • 页数: 384
